participant_1.background:
I cherish the memories I've made with my friends and family more than anything else.
i work in the emergency room.
i have not spoken to my family in years.
I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world.
I am an Indian-American wedding photographer.

participant_2.background:
I drink far too much soda, which is not good for my health.
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
i m often late for class.
i work at a hotel.
I collect souvenirs from my travels.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing?
Hello, I'm doing well. How are you today?
I'm doing good, thanks for asking. I'm a wedding photographer, and I love it! What do you do for a living?
I work as an online tutor, and I also work at a hotel.
Oh wow, that's interesting! How do you like working as an online tutor?
It's really fun, and I get to set my own hours.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I'm pretty lucky. What about you, do you like being a wedding photographer?
I love it! I get to meet new people and help them capture their special day.
That sounds really fun! I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it must be so rewarding.
It is! I love being able to help people create memories that will last a lifetime.
That's so great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I am. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel, and I collect souvenirs from all the places I go.
Oh wow, that's cool! I love to travel too. I've been to a few different countries, but I'd love to see more of the world.
Me too! I've been to a few different countries in Europe, but I'd love to go to Asia and South America someday.
That would be amazing! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
Japan is on my list too! I've heard it's a beautiful country.
I'm sure it is! I've also heard that the food is amazing.
Yes, I've heard that too! I'm definitely looking forward to trying all the different foods.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'd love to travel together sometime.
Me too! That would be so much fun!
